casebody.data:
No. D-2602. In the Matter of Discipline of Paul C. Droz. 564 U.S. 1034, 131 S. Ct. 3087,

180 L. Ed. 2d 908,

2011 U.S. LEXIS 4978. June 27, 2011.

Paul C. Droz, of Mesquite, Nevada, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, re*909quiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
